doc.title: What Casey Won at the Raffle
doc.plot: An Irish kitchen and an Irish woman cooking. She takes the baby out of the cradle, gives him a bottle and sits him on the floor. Casey comes in drunk with a pig under his arm and puts the pig on the floor. It makes a bee-line for baby and bottle, takes the bottle from the baby and proceeds to suck the milk, while Casey and wife have a hot argument.
